verses.verse: The proverbs <WH4912> of SHlomo <WH8010> the son <WH1121> of David <WH1732>, king <WH4428> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>;
To know <WH3045> <WH8800> wisdom <WH2451> and instruction <WH4148>; to perceive <WH995> <WH8687> the words <WH561> of understanding <WH998>;
To receive <WH3947> <WH8800> the instruction <WH4148> of wisdom <WH7919> <WH8687>, justice <WH6664>, and judgment <WH4941>, and equity <WH4339>;
To give <WH5414> <WH8800> subtilty <WH6195> to the simple <WH6612>, to the young man <WH5288> knowledge <WH1847> and discretion <WH4209>.

A wise <WH2450> man will hear <WH8085> <WH8799>, and will increase <WH3254> <WH8686> learning <WH3948>; and a man of understanding <WH995> <WH8737> shall attain <WH7069> <WH8799> unto wise counsels <WH8458>:
To understand <WH995> <WH8687> a proverb <WH4912>, and the interpretation <WH4426>; the words <WH1697> of the wise <WH2450>, and their dark sayings <WH2420>.
The fear <WH3374> of the YY <WH3068> is the beginning <WH7225> of knowledge <WH1847>: but fools <WH191> despise <WH936> <WH8804> wisdom <WH2451> and instruction <WH4148>.
My son <WH1121>, hear <WH8085> <WH8798> the instruction <WH4148> of thy father <WH1>, and forsake <WH5203> <WH8799> not the Torah <WH8451> of thy mother <WH517>:
For they shall be an ornament <WH3880> of grace <WH2580> unto thy head <WH7218>, and chains <WH6060> about thy neck <WH1621>.
My son <WH1121>, if sinners <WH2400> entice <WH6601> <WH8762> thee, consent <WH14> <WH8799> thou not.

If they say <WH559> <WH8799>, Come <WH3212> <WH8798> with us, let us lay wait <WH693> <WH8799> for blood <WH1818>, let us lurk <WH6845> <WH8799> privily for the innocent <WH5355> without cause <WH2600>:
Let us swallow them up <WH1104> <WH8799> alive <WH2416> as the grave <WH7585>; and whole <WH8549>, as those that go down <WH3381> <WH8802> into the pit <WH953>:
We shall find <WH4672> <WH8799> all precious <WH3368> substance <WH1952>, we shall fill <WH4390> <WH8762> our houses <WH1004> with spoil <WH7998>:
Cast <WH5307> <WH8686> in thy lot <WH1486> among <WH8432> us; let us all have one <WH259> purse <WH3599>:
My son <WH1121>, walk <WH3212> <WH8799> not thou in the way <WH1870> with them; refrain <WH4513> <WH8798> thy foot <WH7272> from their path <WH5410>:
For their feet <WH7272> run <WH7323> <WH8799> to evil <WH7451>, and make haste <WH4116> <WH8762> to shed <WH8210> <WH8800> blood <WH1818>.
Surely in vain <WH2600> the net <WH7568> is spread <WH2219> <WH8794> in the sight <WH5869> of any bird <WH1167> <WH3671>.
And they lay wait <WH693> <WH8799> for their own blood <WH1818>; they lurk privily <WH6845> <WH8799> for their own lives <WH5315>.
So are the ways <WH734> of every one that is greedy <WH1214> <WH8802> of gain <WH1215>; which taketh away <WH3947> <WH8799> the life <WH5315> of the owners <WH1167> thereof.
Wisdom <WH2454> crieth <WH7442> <WH8799> without <WH2351>; she uttereth <WH5414> <WH8799> her voice <WH6963> in the streets <WH7339>:

She crieth <WH7121> <WH8799> in the chief place <WH7218> of concourse <WH1993> <WH8802>, in the openings <WH6607> of the gates <WH8179>: in the city <WH5892> she uttereth <WH559> <WH8799> her words <WH561>, saying,

How long, ye simple ones <WH6612>, will ye love <WH157> <WH8799> simplicity <WH6612>? and the scorners <WH3887> <WH8801> delight <WH2530> <WH8804> in their scorning <WH3944>, and fools <WH3684> hate <WH8130> <WH8799> knowledge <WH1847> ?
Turn <WH7725> <WH8799> you at my reproof <WH8433>: behold, I will pour out <WH5042> <WH8686> my spirit <WH7307> unto you, I will make known <WH3045> <WH8686> my words <WH1697> unto you.
Because I have called <WH7121> <WH8804>, and ye refused <WH3985> <WH8762>; I have stretched out <WH5186> <WH8804> my hand <WH3027>, and no man regarded <WH7181> <WH8688>;
But ye have set at nought <WH6544> <WH8799> all my counsel <WH6098>, and would <WH14> <WH8804> none of my reproof <WH8433>:
I also will laugh <WH7832> <WH8799> at your calamity <WH343>; I will mock <WH3932> <WH8799> when your fear <WH6343> cometh <WH935> <WH8800>;

When your fear <WH6343> cometh <WH935> <WH8800> as desolation <WH7722> <WH8675> <WH7584>, and your destruction <WH343> cometh <WH857> <WH8799> as a whirlwind <WH5492>; when distress <WH6869> and anguish <WH6695> cometh <WH935> <WH8800> upon you.
Then shall they call <WH7121> <WH8799> upon me, but I will not answer <WH6030> <WH8799>; they shall seek me early <WH7836> <WH8762>, but they shall not find <WH4672> <WH8799> me:
For that they hated <WH8130> <WH8804> knowledge <WH1847>, and did not choose <WH977> <WH8804> the fear <WH3374> of the YY <WH3068>:
They would <WH14> <WH8804> none of my counsel <WH6098>: they despised <WH5006> <WH8804> all my reproof <WH8433>.
Therefore shall they eat <WH398> <WH8799> of the fruit <WH6529> of their own way <WH1870>, and be filled <WH7646> <WH8799> with their own devices <WH4156>.
For the turning away <WH4878> of the simple <WH6612> shall slay <WH2026> <WH8799> them, and the prosperity <WH7962> of fools <WH3684> shall destroy <WH6> <WH8762> them.
But whoso hearkeneth <WH8085> <WH8802> unto me shall dwell <WH7931> <WH8799> safely <WH983>, and shall be quiet <WH7599> <WH8768> from fear <WH6343> of evil <WH7451>.
